nodes.text: Magaloof was a criminal Leffingite male from Almak who lived the life of a speeder thief on the planet Coruscant. During a ride in a speeder, Magaloof narrowly avoided Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, who was flying through the skylines whilst hanging onto an assassin droid. Although Magaloof had seen a number of odd sights, he had never seen a Jedi in such a position before.
